header.overview: The header defines a macro that extracts an element from a .

macro.abstract: The macro extracts an element from a .

usage.param: The zero-based index of the element to be extracted. Valid values range from 0 to .
The from which an element is to be extracted.

macro.para: This macro extracts the i-th element of seq. Consequently, seq must contain at least i + 1 elements.
macro.listing:
#include #include
#define A (a)(b)(c)
(0, A) // a (1, A) // b (2, A) // c
#if
#define B (a, b)(c)(d, e, f)
(0, B) // a, b (1, B) // c (2, B) // d, e, f
#endif
